title: Stage Lv10-S11
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Tell me about it! I think exactly the same way.
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Tell me about it! I think exactly the same way.
Absolutely. I totally relate to that.

sentences.kr: 내 말이 바로 그거야! 완전 맞는 말이야.
sentences.en: That's exactly what I'm talking about! You're spot on.

sentences.kr: 백 퍼센트 동의해. 더 이상 말할 것도 없어.
sentences.en: I agree one hundred percent. There's nothing more to say.

sentences.kr: 그런 식으로 생각한 적 없었는데, 말이 되네.
sentences.en: I never thought of it that way, but it makes perfect sense.
I'm thinking the exact same thing. We're on the same wavelength!

sentences.kr: 바로 그거야! 내가 표현하고 싶었던 게.
sentences.en: That's it! That's exactly what I was trying to express.
